name: Trash Panda's guide to surviving lockdown
name_original: Trash Panda's guide to surviving lockdown
description:
Play as a raccoon in a race against time to collect enough trash before Slim Jim cleans up the park.

As Lockdown restrictions get tighter, less people are throwing out rubbish.

Pickup trash and drop it in your burrow to store it.
Interact with the garbage bin to collect trash that Slim Jim has stored.
Collect 3 bits of trash to complete the level.

Made by: 

Janet Ang
Siosaia Feiloakitau
Wayd Barton-Redgrave
